welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hospet, a charming city known for its rich history and stunning architecture. Get ready to explore ancient ruins, vibrant markets, and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your time here and take in everything this beautiful city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Naivedyam Restaurant
restaurants.description: Naivedyam Restaurant is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Hospet.

restaurants.description: Temptations is a indian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Jindal Airport, serving regional and domestic flights.
